data.eml:eml: Discothyrea soesilae sp. nov. from Suriname (Hymenoptera: Formicidae).

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Makhan, D. (2007): Discothyrea soesilae sp. nov. from Suriname (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Calodema Supplementary Paper 27: 1-3, URL: http://hdl.handle.net/10199/15413
